title: Transfer of assets in contemplation of
context: ยง412:2-418 Transfer of assets in contemplation of insolvency void. All transfers, assignments, and payments by any Hawaii financial institution made after or in contemplation of the institution&rsquo;s insolvency shall be void if done with the intent to evade this chapter or to accord preference to any depositor or creditor over another. [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1]
